item.title: The Miracle Morning
item.description: The Miracle Morning Summary Hal Elrod Wake up early at the same time every day You can achieve level 10 success in every field Follow life S.A.V.E.R.S every morning S: Silence A: Affirmations V: Visualizations E: Exercise R: Read S: Scribe “Your self talk has powerful impact on your success in each field.” “Weather you think you can or you think you can’t, you are right.

item.title: The Psychology of Money
item.description: The Psychology of Money Morgan Housel Most money decisions are made by personal experiences. Something that makes sense to one, might sound crazy to another. We don’t have much data/experience with money and we are just working with our experiences. “I want you to be successful, and I want you to earn it. But realize that not all success is due to hard work, and not all poverty is due to laziness.
